Author: cornycorncorny
Text: This happens to me too! Whenever I binged, my step dad would always say, "Good for you! Eat more to fatten you up!" I was already at a normal weight and this made me feel really bad. My mom also encouraged it because I needed to gain weight. Little did they know I sat in front of the pantry crying while shoving food in my face to "punish" myself even more for eating so I could feel more fat and full to hate myself more.
